txt.en:
'Look at this here, [placeholder]! In these ancient passages, it says that the vault of Mezel-saluch contains a trove of weapons forged long ago in the furnaces of Khazad-dûm! What a find that would be!

'If you can bring those weapons to me, I shall reward you richly! In any case, we must not let them fall into the hands of the goblins.

'Mezel-saluch lies in Durin's Way. I suggest that you take a few allies if you venture into that place.'

'You recovered them! Excellent! These axes may have been forged long ago, but they have lost none of their lustre or strength!

'They'll need a bit of work -- the leather and bindings have long since rotted away -- but their craftsmanship remains, and soon they shall once again defend the halls of Khazad-dûm from the Orcs!

'I am sure there are more weapons within Mezel-saluch, however....'
'Those weapons could provide the difference we need in our efforts to retake Khazad-dûm!'
HIDING CONTENT - DNT - Mezel-saluch: Weapons of Moria

Gansi's records show that the vault of Mezel-saluch should contain a cache of weapons forged in the depths of Moria long ago. These would make a fine addition to the dwarf-armoury, as well as a kingly find should they be recovered.
Mezel-saluch is in Durin's Way.\n\nGansi has tasked you with retrieving a number of ancient dwarf-weapons from the hidden vault of Mezel-saluch.
Talk to Gansi at the Chamber of the Crossroads
Gansi is at the Chamber of the Crossroads, within Durin's Way.\n\nYou should return the ancient weapons you have recovered to Gansi.
